header_text: You are in a meeting, and during a brief break, you call home to speak to your significant other. You are late getting back into the meeting room, so everyone looks up when you open the door. Others see your actions as disruptive.

elements.text: After the meeting you realize that the other students were probably just surprised that the door suddenly opened. Chances are they think that your opening and closing the door quietly means you are...

elements.name: You are in a meeting, and during a brief break, you call home to speak to your significant other. You are late getting back into the meeting room, so everyone looks up when you open the door. Others see your actions as disruptive._Work/Career Development_puzzle_word2
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
